articles.title: 'Not much left' of Australian town ravaged by fire
articles.description: Residents are not yet allowed to return to Balmoral amid ongoing safety concerns over bushfires.

 The small community of Balmoral is 120km (75 miles) from Sydney
The leader of New South Wales, Gladys Berejiklian, says "catastrophic" fire conditions have almost completely razed one Australian community to the ground.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Dancing on Ice embraces same-sex pair
articles.description: Primetime TV history will be made in the UK this weekend, when Dancing on Ice includes a same-sex couple in the competition.
articles.content: VideoIan 'H' Watkins from Steps has teamed up with professional skater Matt Evers to become the first same-sex duo to take part in a dance competition on British TV.
